page.title: 01SITUATION;GENERAL VIEW
page.content: {Dalavich}is situated on the banks of Loch Awe in{Argyll}in the west of Scotland.The nearest town, Oban,26 miles away,is a small town beside the sea. The next school is 7 miles away. There are many trees,mainly silver birch,douglas fir and pines.On walks you can see animals that you would rarley see in a city like roe,fallow and red deer,squirrels,white stags and lots more. The weather here is usually very wet.Sometimes it is warm but it is very rare for it to be hot.You can trust the weathermen to say "very wet and cold"for our area. The houses here are usually made of wood because we have so much of it but some are made of stone.
